author: vincent_vda
title: Cornelius Cat (Fisherman)
review:
A nice minifig of a light brown-headed cat with a blue vest and yellow pants. Comes packed with a frying pan and a fishing rod (to bake the fish after catching it).

One of the rarer Fabuland pieces it seems as you don't find a lot of information on this.

This is my Lego town's mascotte.

author: AETerry
title: Fisherman Cat Review
review:
This set follows the same "set" lay out for a lot of Fabuland mini sets of a minifigure and a couple of accessories.

 

Which is good for an age group of children who want just a minifigure to play with and not a whole lot of bricks, or they're just not quiet there for building with bricks.

 

There's been a lot of fun with this set and other Fabuland over the years back to when I was that young.
